column2: Brushed DC motor with gearbox - 6V/1:100/155 RPM with encoder (FIT0483)
Laser cut base (5 mm clear acrylic)
5 mm spacer for mounting ball caster
M2 25 mm screws for mounting ball caster to body via spacers
M2 10 mm screws for mounting motor/mount to body
M2 nuts for mounting motor/mount to body
Alligator clip to 0.64 mm pin (20 cm)
Kit of multi-length 22 AWG breadboard jumpers
